mapper.select: SELECT shopAssistant.id, shopAssistant.assistant_phone AS assistantPhone, shopAssistant.store_id AS storeId, shopStore.store_name AS storeName FROM t_shop_assistant AS shopAssistant LEFT JOIN t_shop_store AS shopStore ON shopAssistant.store_id = shopStore.id AND shopStore.deleted = 0 WHERE shopAssistant.deleted = 0 AND shopAssistant.shop_id = #{shopId} ORDER BY shopAssistant.create_time DESC
